name: Pyramid Scheme (Sveen77)
description:
Overview

The wealthy pharaoh’s tomb is under attack from all sides, and your time has finally come. Do your job as the tomb’s guardian and fend off these attackers using your ancient sun staff. Do not let any of these ruffians reach the tomb, once they’re inside there is nothing else you can do.

Keep. Them. Away.

As you valiantly defend the tomb, the greed of your enemy grows, causing them to send more and more thugs to steal your master’s riches! Fight to the bitter end, fulfil your duty!

Controls

wasd - To move around

j - To shoot

q - Rotate character -45° angle

e - Rotate character 45° angle

Made By Group 5:

Timothy Parker, Jean-Luc Sapier, To Mo (Eldridge) Chan, Danny Jiang
